title: Define project scope and objectives
description: Establish the specific areas of biotechnology synthetique that will be focused on in the project, and set clear goals for what the project aims to achieve.

title: Research and gather information on synthetic biotechnology for personalized drug creation
description: Conduct comprehensive research to gain a thorough understanding of the field of synthetic biotechnology, its potential applications in drug creation, and how these technologies can be effectively utilized for creating personalized medications. Focus on identifying recent advancements, industry best practices, and potential challenges.

title: Design customized drug creation process
description: Develop a process for creating drugs tailored to individual patient needs using synthetique biotechnology.
dependencies: Research and gather information on synthetique biotechnology

title: Develop necessary technologies for drug creation
description: Design and build the required technologies to enable the customized drug creation process.

title: Collaborate with pharmaceutical experts for validation
description: Work closely with pharmaceutical experts to validate the feasibility and efficacy of the customized drug creation process.
dependencies: Develop necessary technologies for drug creation

title: Test and refine the customized drug creation process
description: Perform testing on the customized drug creation process to ensure its efficiency and accuracy, making necessary adjustments as needed.
dependencies: Collaborate with pharmaceutical experts for validation
